description: Richard Hurndall portrayed the First Doctor, originally played by William Hartnell, in the 20th anniversary special 'The Five Doctors'. His portrayal allowed the character to participate in the multi-Doctor story, bridging the gap after Hartnell's passing.

episodes.description: The Doctor's past incarnations are taken out of time and sent to the Death Zone on Gallifrey.

description: David Bradley portrayed William Hartnell in the docudrama 'An Adventure in Space and Time' and took on the role of the First Doctor in the 'Doctor Who' episodes 'Twice Upon a Time' and 'The Doctor Falls'. His performance brought new life to the character originally portrayed by Hartnell.

episodes.description: The Twelfth Doctor meets the First Doctor and they contemplate their impending regenerations.

description: John Guilor provided the voice for the First Doctor, originally portrayed by William Hartnell, in the 50th-anniversary special episode 'The Day of the Doctor'. His performance paid homage to Hartnell's iconic role in the beloved series.

episodes.description: The War Doctor meets the Tenth and Eleventh Doctors in a mission to save Gallifrey.
